long_description: welcome. at the heart centred herb company we believe that what you think and feel creates your health, and we want to show you that what happens to you, affects your health. mental health issues, anxiety, depression, sadness, loss and trauma can be treated physically because after all, they are physical conditions. our range of products focuses on treating your emotions on a physical level so that you can heal and live the best version of yourself.
